title: Care Partners
content:
Your partnership has the power to transform the lives of the some of the most vulnerable members of society, while also meeting your corporate social responsibility objectives and engaging your staff. We honor your Care Partner donations by recognizing your partnership through Portland Rescue Missionâ€™s marketing channels as well as providing you with a branded marketing toolkit that you can use to spread the word to your friends, family and customers.

Available Packages

Own the Day: $1,881

Own the Day and Night: $3,477

Restart Life: $11,676

Restore Life (6 months): $14,000

Restore Life (12 months): $28,000
